duty_description: Controller shall limit collection of personal data to what is adequate, relevant, and reasonably necessary in relation to the purposes for which data is processed.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation

duty_description: Controller shall not process personal data for purposes that are not reasonably necessary to, or compatible with, the disclosed purposes for which such personal data is processed, unless the controller obtains the consumer's consent.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation

duty_name: Duty to Respond to Rights Requests
duty_description: Controller shall respond to consumer rights requests within 45 days (extendable by 45 days with notice); provide an appeal process if request is denied; inform consumer of right to contact Attorney General if appeal is denied.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation

duty_description: Controller shall honor universal opt-out mechanism signals (such as Global Privacy Control) as valid opt-out requests for targeted advertising and sales of personal data.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation

duty_description: Controller shall provide clear and conspicuous privacy notice disclosing: categories of personal data collected; purposes of processing; whether data is shared or sold; consumer rights; and available opt-out mechanisms.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation

duty_description: Controller shall obtain clear, affirmative, freely-given, specific, informed, and unambiguous consent for processing sensitive personal data; shall not use dark patterns or prohibited consent practices.
penalty_for_violation: Civil penalty up to $20000 per violation
